      public static java.lang.String httpRequest​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String path, java.lang.String peer, java.lang.String agent, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String[] par, java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream buf) throws java.lang.Exception
      do one request
      Parameters:
      url - url of app
      path - path of app
      peer - client address
      agent - user agent
      user - auth data
      par - parameters
      buf - result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
      Returns:
      [pathname"][file name.]extension
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if something went wrong
